_sText:
Removing green squares:
esc>options>video>advanced>texture detail>medium.

EDIT! second version is done!

fixed:
- File size is decreased!
- Light environment is changed!
- Hl2.exe crash is fixed!
- And some other little bugs!


Deathrun_synchronicity

Map made by Ivar and Komaokc.
If we forgot you in the credits, please tell me in a pm, and I will add you.

Beta version. Bugs and other things may be fixed in later versions.

CREDITS:
Thanks to Mapjunkies.com.
Thanks to BuckNasty for a part of his skybox.
Thanks to i3D.net and DragonRock studio's.
Thanks to ArchAngel and Target Practice for help.
Thanks to loller dan for the speedmod idea.
Thanks to FAJ for the killer machine.
Thanks to Dj.Hazzkake for all the testing!
Thanks to everyone who helped us!

INFORMATION:
+- 14 traps and +- 5 breakable glass plates (hard to find!)
Almost all traps are new, and if they aren't, they are creatively new-made.

NAME EXPLANATIONL
synchronicity
    (sin'-krun-iss'-it-tee) n. 1: the relation that exists when events occur at the same time; simultaneity; synchronism. 2: coincidence of events that seem to be meaningfully related, conceived in Jungian theory as an explanatory principle on the level of causality; used especially for psychic events that are not explained by conventional mechanisms of causality. [from Greek syn- "same" + khronos "time."]

STORY:
Earth 2156 A.D.
After all the world's recourses have been depleted, the 2 big factions, west and east, go out to space to collect valuable minerals and water. Over the years, thousands of space stations were made. Now the earth is under attack by an alien race, out for more inhabitable planets. The aliens look exactly like humans but they have an unstoppable desire for blood.
Now they are trying to cut off the world’s recourses supply by taking over the stations, to stop them, the space stations started making special traps in their entrances to stop the aliens from taking over. Now it’s your job to stop them! So, pick up the custom gun and shoot it!
But be fast, the maximum number of players is 3. If you are too late, the timer is off, and you're dead!


CONTACT:
Do you want parts of the map, or files, or do you have a question about something, send me a pm, and I will answer as soon as possible!

DECOMPILING:
You are allowed to decompile this map, but do not steel anything and ask me for permission.
